# doit_roles (Data Source)

Roles define permissions and access levels for users in your organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all IAM roles in the organization
data "doit_roles" "all" {}

# Output role names
output "role_names" {
  value = [for r in data.doit_roles.all.roles : r.name]
}

# Find a specific role by name
output "admin_role" {
  value = [for r in data.doit_roles.all.roles : r if r.name == "Admin"][0]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `roles` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roles))

<a id="nestedatt--roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `roles`

Read-Only:

- `customer` (String) The customer ID if this is a custom role
- `id` (String) The unique ID of the role
- `name` (String) The name of the role
- `permissions` (List of String) List of permission IDs assigned to the role
- `type` (String) The type of the role (preset or custom)
